channel.title: Setup a Server on Linux (Help?)
channel.description:
Well I don't get how to solve this.
Here we go:
/installed java/ /added my server files/ /Configured evrything right i guess/
So if I want to run my (run.sh), I get this error: [QUOTE] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server [/QUOTE]
Would be great if anyone could help me.

/Configured evrything right i guess/
